org.apache.flink.core.fs

类 ConnectionLimitingFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.core.fs.ConnectionLimitingFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FileSystemFactory

    @Internal
public class ConnectionLimitingFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileSystemFactory
    A wrapping factory that adds a LimitedConnectionsFileSystem to a file system.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private FileSystemFactory factory 
      private LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.ConnectionLimitingSettings settings 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      限定符 构造器和说明
      private ConnectionLimitingFactory(FileSystemFactory factory, LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.ConnectionLimitingSettings settings) 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void configure(Configuration config)
      Applies the given configuration to this factory.
      FileSystem create(java.net.URI fsUri)
      Creates a new file system for the given file system URI.
      static FileSystemFactory decorateIfLimited(FileSystemFactory factory, java.lang.String scheme, Configuration config)
      Decorates the given factory for a ConnectionLimitingFactory, if the given configuration configured connection limiting for the given file system scheme.
      java.lang.String getScheme()
      Gets the scheme of the file system created by this factory.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getScheme

        public java.lang.String getScheme()
        从接口复制的说明: FileSystemFactory
        Gets the scheme of the file system created by this factory.
        指定者:
        getScheme 在接口中 FileSystemFactory

      • configure

        public void configure(Configuration config)
        从接口复制的说明: FileSystemFactory
        Applies the given configuration to this factory. All future file system instantiations via FileSystemFactory.create(URI) should take the configuration into account.
        指定者:
        configure 在接口中 FileSystemFactory
        参数:
        config - The configuration to apply.

      • create

        public FileSystem create(java.net.URI fsUri)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: FileSystemFactory
        Creates a new file system for the given file system URI. The URI describes the type of file system (via its scheme) and optionally the authority (for example the host) of the file system.
        指定者:
        create 在接口中 FileSystemFactory
        参数:
        fsUri - The URI that describes the file system.
        返回:
        A new instance of the specified file system.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the file system could not be instantiated.

      • decorateIfLimited

        public static FileSystemFactory decorateIfLimited(FileSystemFactory factory,
                                                  java.lang.String scheme,
                                                  Configuration config)
        Decorates the given factory for a ConnectionLimitingFactory, if the given configuration configured connection limiting for the given file system scheme. Otherwise, it returns the given factory as is.
        参数:
        factory - The factory to potentially decorate.
        scheme - The file scheme for which to check the configuration.
        config - The configuration
        返回:
        The decorated factors, if connection limiting is configured, the original factory otherwise.
